title: Advance Epsilon
text:
The Advance Epsilon is a family of <a href="Switzerland">Swiss</a> single-place <a href="paraglider">paraglider</a>s, designed and produced by <a href="Advance%20Thun">Advance Thun</a> of <a href="Thun">Thun</a>.
Design and development.
The Epsilon was designed as a basic-intermediate glider intended for <a href="thermalling">thermalling</a> flight.
The design has progressed through nine generations of models, the Epsilon, Epsilon 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 and 9 each improving on the last. The models are each named for their rough wing area in square metres.
